item.title: Warren Buffett is reportedly eyeing Berkshire Hathaway's biggest deal in three years

item.title: Warren Buffett's Japan bet that he discovered by reading a 'little handbook' is up as much as sixfold
item.description: "We expect Berkshire Hathaway to continue to build up stakes in the sector's big five companies at a moderate pace for the time being," JPMorgan said.

item.title: Worried about the AI trade faltering? Look at these stocks, Trivariate says

item.title: OpenAI deal puts Etsy at the 'leading edge of agentic commerce,' BTIG says
